forum.content:
it's been quite long ever since the very last day we bade each other farewell
I miss you, so much that everything about you that I've tried to forget has become so vivid
I've been trying to get rid of the obsession, and deny the fact that I am crazy for you
I almost succeeded in persuading myself that I might have mistaken my feelings for you
yet once again, I know there's no denying that you are my angel, no matter how much harm
it has caused, even leading to the day I attempted suicide
it's never been your fault
it's me not being clear-minded and having done such a foolish thing and I've lost you ever since
I don't know whether you'll be back, but there's one thing for sure - I am here for you and I'll always be there whether it's a sunny day or a stormy one
I don't get it myself how come you've become so important to me and everything I've ever wanted
love is without reason
maybe only Cupid knows why
forum.title: Free Falling
